attributes.action: Allow Pentecostal Ministries to build new churches. Allow the decisions of Church planning permissions to not take longer than 1 year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition to support, and enable Evangelical Pentecostal churches, to successfully expand, their church ministries, and gain the ability to be successful while going through the process of planning permission to build new churches, and be based in new premises. Also, for the local Government authority to take no longer than 1 year to give churches permission to build new churche buildings.

rejection.details: Planning is a matter for Local Authorities, and it is for them to consider plans for new buildings on a case by case basis.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
